channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Permanent Outdoor Lights (2025): Govee, Eufy, Lepro
item.description: DIY permanent eave lights that attach to the exterior of your home are becoming more popular. But are they worth the effort (and cost)?

item.title: Zevo wants to add robotaxis to its car-share fleet, starting with newcomer Tensor
item.description: As robotaxi adoption continues, wild ideas like personal ownership and renting them out are starting to pop up again.

item.title: Does Red-Light Therapy Work? (2025)
item.description: Even if the glowing mask scares your family, red-light therapy can rejuvenate skin and aid in muscle repair.

item.title: Best Merino Wool T-Shirts (2025), Tried On and Tested
item.description: These merino wool T-shirts are the last shirt you’ll ever wear. I’m wearing one right now.

item.title: Flaw in photo booth maker’s website exposes customers’ pictures
item.description: Hama Film makes photo booths that upload pictures and videos online. But their backend systems have a simple flaw that allows anyone to download custo...

item.title: World launches its ‘super app,’ including crypto pay and encrypted chat features
item.description: Tools for Humanity, the company behind the app, is seeking to expand its "real human network."

item.title: Baseus Inspire XH1 Headphones Review: Affordable Excellence
item.description: Watch out high-end models, these noise-canceling headphones are an amazing value.

item.title: Reddit argues it isn’t like other social platforms in case against Australia’s social media ban
item.description: Reddit, one of the world's largest social platforms, is arguing that it doesn't meet the definition of "social media platforms" as it seeks to overtur...

item.title: Stanford’s star reporter takes on Silicon Valley’s ‘money-soaked’ startup culture
item.description: His reporting on a Stanford University president put Theo Baker on the map, but his upcoming book may cement his reputation as the rare young journali...

item.title: The Best Age-Tech Gadgets Tried and Tested by WIRED
item.description: As more and more age tech hits the market, I’ve been testing the most innovative gadgets for older folks and caregivers.
